Room.Name: Alturis Road/Charybdis Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Charybdis Way, going north from here, and Alturis Road, running east to west. The Gardens are to the south.
Room.LongDescription: The Hanging Gardens of Kista are perhaps the most impressive monument to any person ever built. The giant monument has three levels and looks like a great fountain with exotic plants and trees growing wherever there is room. The base of the monument is almost completely made of gold with scattered bits of platinum and silver to give it some contrast.
